main.name: Elijah Soladoye
main.occupation: Fullstack Django | ReactJS Developer && UE4 Game Development Enthusiast
main.description: Always learning how to build positively impacting, optimized and immersive stuff. #Mikaelson
main.bio: My name is Elijah, I'm a Full Stack Django | ReactJS Developer. Just recently started learning React to compliment my Django so as to be fit for job placements, I've worked on E-commerce websites, Real time chatting apps, Blog apps worked with Allauth authentication, payment gateways like Paystack, Stripe, etc. Business campaign technologies like Sendgrid, Mailgun and Mailchimp, I also intend to go into Game dev much later when I'm able to get the required equipments. Currently Learning from a lot of tutors including Clever Programmer while also developing for clients.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to to build amazing and impacting stuff, I love a good challenge and more experience, so don't hold back.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Sonny Sangha must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
